sentence: People of western North Carolina are tired of the antics,'' said Michele Woodhouse, the elected Republican chair of Mr. Cawthorn's district and a former staunch supporter.
title: House Republicans Tire of Madison Cawthorn's Antics. Some in His District Have, Too.
